verses.verse: Behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servant, whom I <S%H8551>uphold<s%>; my <S%H972>chosen<s%>, in whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7521>delighteth<s%>: I have <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> upon <S%H3318>him<s%>; he will bring forth <S%H4941>justice<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>.
He will not <S%H6817>cry<s%>, nor lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor cause it to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H2351>street<s%>.

A <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> will he not <S%H7665>break<s%>, and a <S%H3544>dimly<s%> burning <S%H6594>wick<s%> will he not <S%H3518>quench<s%>: he will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%>.

He will not <S%H3543>fail<s%> nor be <S%H7533>discouraged<s%>, till he have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H3176>wait<s%> for his <S%H8451>law<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and stretched them <S%H5186>forth<s%>; he that spread <S%H7554>abroad<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and that which cometh <S%H7554>out<s%> of <S%H5414>it<s%>; he that giveth <S%H5397>breath<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> upon <S%H7307>it<s%>, and spirit to them that walk <S%H1980>therein<s%>:

I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H7121>called<s%> thee in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and will <S%H2388>hold<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and will <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H5414>thee<s%>, and give thee for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, for a <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>;

to <S%H6491>open<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H616>prisoners<s%> from the <S%H4525>dungeon<s%>, and them that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> out of <S%H3608>the<s%> <S%H1004>prison-house<s%>.
I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that is my <S%H8034>name<s%>; and my <S%H3519>glory<s%> will I not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%>, neither my <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto graven <S%H6456>images<s%>.
Behold <S%H7223><s%>, the former things are come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, and new <S%H2319>things<s%> do I <S%H5046>declare<s%>; before they spring <S%H6779>forth<s%> I tell you of <S%H8085>them<s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>, and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; ye that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and all that is <S%H4393>therein<s%>, the <S%H339>isles<s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427>thereof<s%>.

Let the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof lift <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H2691>voice<s%>, the villages that <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> doth <S%H3427>inhabit<s%>; let the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5553>Sela<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%>, let them <S%H6681>shout<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.
Let them <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H339>islands<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%>; he will stir <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H7068>zeal<s%> like a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>: he will <S%H7321>cry<s%>, <S%H6873>yea<s%>, he will shout aloud; he will do <S%H1396>mightily<s%> against his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

I have long <S%H5769>time<s%> holden my <S%H2814>peace<s%>; I have been <S%H2790>still<s%>, and <S%H662>refrained<s%> <S%H6463>myself<s%>: now will I cry out like a travailing <S%H3205>woman<s%>; I will <S%H5395>gasp<s%> and <S%H7602>pant<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

I will lay <S%H2717>waste<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and dry <S%H3001>up<s%> all their <S%H6212>herbs<s%>; and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H339>islands<s%>, and will dry <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H98>pools<s%>.

And I will <S%H3212>bring<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> by a <S%H1870>way<s%> that they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5410>not<s%>; in paths that they <S%H3045>know<s%> not will I <S%H1869>lead<s%> <S%H7760>them<s%>; I will make <S%H4285>darkness<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4625>them<s%>, and crooked places <S%H4334>straight<s%>. These <S%H4625>things<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%>, and I will not forsake <S%H5800>them<s%>.

They shall be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, they shall be <S%H1322>utterly<s%> put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, that <S%H982>trust<s%> in graven <S%H6459>images<s%>, that <S%H559>say<s%> unto molten <S%H4541>images<s%>, Ye are our <S%H430>gods<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye <S%H2795>deaf<s%>; and <S%H5027>look<s%>, ye <S%H5787>blind<s%>, that ye may <S%H7200>see<s%>.

Who is <S%H5787>blind<s%>, but my <S%H5650>servant<s%>? or <S%H2795>deaf<s%>, as my <S%H4397>messenger<s%> that I <S%H7971>send<s%>? who is <S%H5787>blind<s%> as he that is at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H5787>me<s%>, and blind as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%>?
Thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> many <S%H7227>things<s%>, but thou <S%H8104>observest<s%> <S%H241>not<s%>; his ears are <S%H6491>open<s%>, but he heareth <S%H8085>not<s%>.
It <S%H2654>pleased<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, for his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>' <S%H1431>sake<s%>, to magnify the <S%H8451>law<s%>, and make it <S%H142>honorable<s%>.

But this is a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H962>robbed<s%> and <S%H8154>plundered<s%>; they are all of them <S%H6351>snared<s%> in <S%H2352>holes<s%>, and they are <S%H2244>hid<s%> in <S%H3608>prison<s%> - <S%H1004>houses<s%>: they are for a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and none <S%H5337>delivereth<s%>; for a <S%H4933>spoil<s%>, and none <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H7725>Restore<s%>.
Who is there among you that will give <S%H238>ear<s%> to <S%H7181>this<s%>? that will hearken and <S%H8085>hear<s%> for the time to <S%H268>come<s%>?

Who <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H4933>spoil<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H962>robbers<s%>? did not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? he against <S%H2098>whom<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and in whose <S%H1870>ways<s%> they <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H1980>walk<s%>, neither were they <S%H8085>obedient<s%> unto his <S%H8451>law<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H8210>poured<s%> upon him the <S%H2534>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and the <S%H5807>strength<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>; and it set him on <S%H3857>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, yet he <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H1197>not<s%>; and it burned <S%H7760>him<s%>, yet he laid it not to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
